SPEED/CONSUMPTION
AT SEA
FULL
BALLAST ABT 14.3 KNOTS ON ABT 25MT TONS IFO AND ABT 0.1 MT MDO
LADEN   ABT 13.8 KNOTS ON ABT 25MT TONS IFO AND ABT 0.1 MT MDO
ECO
BALLAST ABT 13.5 KNOTS ON ABT 20.5MT TONS IFO AND ABT 0.1 MT MDO
LADEN   ABT 13.0 KNOTS ON ABT 20.5MT TONS IFO AND ABT 0.1 MT MDO
BALLAST ABT 12.5 KNOTS ON ABT 17MT TONS IFO AND ABT 0.1 MT MDO
LADEN   ABT 12.0 KNOTS ON ABT 17MT TONS IFO AND ABT 0.1 MT MDO
IN PORT
IDLE            ABT 3.0 METRIC TONS IFO AND ABT 0.5 METRIC TONS MDO
WORKING       ABT 5.0 METRIC TONS IFO AND ABT 0.5 METRIC TONS MDO
ABT MEANS AN ALLOWANCE OF +/- 0.5KN ON SPEED AND +/- 5PCT ON CONSUMPTION, TIME LOST/SAVED, LSFO LOST/SAVED, LMDO LOST/SAVED,IF ANY, SHALL BE ALLOWED TO OFFSET EACH OTHER.
THE VESSEL’S DESCRIBED SPEED AND CONSUMPTION IS BASED UPON GOOD WEATHER CONDITIONS, WHICH ARE UNDERSTOOD TO PREVAIL
BETWEEN MASTER’S REPORTED POSITIONS OVER A PERIOD OF 24 HRS (NOON TO NOON), WIND SPEEDS OF BEAUFORT FORCE 4 (MAX 16 KNTS) AND TOTAL COMBINED ( SEA AND
SWELL) SIGNIFICANT WAVE HEIGHT CONFIRMED TO LIMITS OF DOUGLAS SEA STATE 3 (MAX 1.25 M). ABOUT IS UNDERSTOOD TO MEAN 0.5 KTS DOWNWARDS IN THE SPEED AND 5% UPWARDS IN THE CONSUMPTION. ANY GAIN ON THE TIME OVER THE ABOVE AND / OR CONSUMPTION BELOW THE ABOVE TO
BE OFF-SET AGAINST LOSS ON TIME AND / OR CONSUMPTION. ASSESMENT FOR ANY UNDER PERFOMANCE SPEED CLAIM/OVER CONSUMPTION TO BE CLACULATED ONLY FOR THE SPECIFIC PERIODS OF
“ GOOD WEATHER” AS DEFINED ABOVE AND NOT
BE EXTENNDED / EXTRAPOLATED TO THE ENTIRETY OF THE VOYAGE DURATION (SEA PASSAGE)
BUNKER GRADE:ISO 8217:2012(E) RMG380 FOR IFO, DMA FOR MDO. - IN CASE 2012 IS NOT AVAILABLE, 2017 TO BE SUPPLIED.
AT PORT, AT MASTERS DISCRETION, OWNERS/MASTER/VESSEL HAVE THE RIGHT TO BURN EXTRA IFO FOR BOILER IN ADDITION TO ABOVE FUEL CONSUMPTION DUE TO SOME CIRCUMSTANCES , INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE VESSEL'S SURROUNDING
TEMPERATURE IS LOW. SUCH EXTRA FUEL CONSUMPTION FOR BOILER IS ABOUT 1.8MT IFO PER 24 HOURS. CHARTERERS SHALL NOT CLAIM AGAINST OWNERS FOR ALL THESE EXTRA FUEL CONSUMPTION.
ADA / WOG
+++++++++++++++++++++
